message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will meet your needs. As we're just starting the negotiation, I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000. This is a competitive price considering its worth to you is $10,000. I'm confident you'll find it a great deal.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $12,000 is still a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. This price reflects the value I place on it, and I believe it's a fair compromise.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still looking to get a better price for the product. Considering its value to me is $15,000, I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $11,500. This is a fair price, considering the value you place on it is $10,000. I'm confident you'll find it a great deal.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $11,500 is still a bit above my budget.  I'm willing to pay $11,000, which I believe is a fair price for both of us.  It's closer to my ideal price and allows you to get more than what John is offering.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still looking to get a better price for the product. Considering its value to me is $15,000, I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $11,750. This is a fair price, considering the value you place on it is $10,000. I'm confident you'll find it a great deal.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $11,750 is still a bit outside my budget. To make this work, I'm going to have to stick to my previous offer of $11,000.  This gives you a decent profit and is closer to my price point.  Let's try to close this deal before we run out of time.

I understand your concerns, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $11,000. Considering the value it holds for me, I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $11,500. This is a fair price, considering the value you place on it is $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and make this deal work.
